text: 2024 Player's Handbook Build Your Hero Who do you want to be? Become a legendary adventurer with the 2024 Playerâ€™s Handbook. Will you play as an evil elf sorcerer, a bombastic orc fighter, or a world-weary druid looking for some peace and quiet? Defend your friends, melt your enemies, heal the wounded, or turn into a bear. You choose how you play.
